body_html:
Linux sandboxing has currently one known performance issue left, which is only relevant though if your actions have lots (thousands) of input files each. An improvement for that is in code review (https://bazel-review.googlesource.com/#/c/7538/) at the moment.

Regarding macOS sandboxing, I haven't had time myself to look into why it is slow.

Regarding macOS sandboxing, I haven't had time myself to look into why it is slow.
body:
Linux sandboxing has currently one known performance issue left, which is only relevant though if your actions have lots (thousands) of input files each. An improvement for that is in code review (https://bazel-review.googlesource.com/#/c/7538/) at the moment.

Regarding macOS sandboxing, I haven't had time myself to look into why it is slow.
